derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, formed irregularly from Greek hekaton 'hundred' + are

entry.tran: 公顷(土地面积单位，等于1万平方米或2.471英亩）
entry.def: A hectare is a measurement of an area of land which is equal to 10,000 square metres, or 2.471 acres.

means.word_mean: 1. (abbreviated `ha') a unit of surface area equal to 100 ares (or 10,000 square meters)
